model_answer: The screen showing Disk Utility erasing a SanDisk Extreme external SSD and formatting it as “Mac OS Extended (Journaled)” named “Boot Drive” occurs in the time segment from 00:06:14 to 00:07:34. Therefore, the correct option is C: [00:06:14 - 00:07:34].

The correct answer is C: [00:00:00 - 00:00:47]. The description in the audio corresponds to the initial startup process of a Mac computer. During this time segment, the user sees the Apple logo with a loading bar while hands type on the keyboard. The speaker also advises adjusting screen brightness and describes the specific key sequence to reset the temporary non-volatile RAM (NVRAM).
